title: Opinion of the European Economic and Social Committee on the 'Proposal for a Directive of the European Parliament and of the Council laying down a procedure for the provision of information in the field of technical standards and regulations and of rules on Information Society services' COM(2010) 179 final - 2010/0095 (COD)
